name: fullstack-open-part3
description: The folder contaning the exercises perfomed in part 3 of the fullstack open course

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../Fullstack-Open/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../Fullstack-Open-Part3/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy

author: Sithabile Mananga
